column1: '''''The Book of Ishness''''' was a sketchbook
column3: where he collected illustrations devoted to "imaginative subjects".<ref>{{CG|C}}

column1: [[John D. Rateliff]] has suggested that Tolkien's creation of the word ''ishness'' might have been inspired by a passage in chapter 7 of [[Lewis Carroll]]'s ''Alice's Adventures in Wonderland'': "did you ever see a thing as a drawing of a muchness!".<ref>{{HM|AI}}
*[http://www.tolkienestate.com/en/painting/the-book-of-ishness.html The Book of Ishness] presented by the [[Tolkien Estate]]
*[http://sacnoths.blogspot.com/2012/11/the-book-of-phobias-and-book-of-ishness.html The Book of Phobias and The Book of Ishness] by [[John D. Rateliff]]
